required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Low-fat Diet on the Pharmacokinetics of Pyrotinib in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open, Single-dose, Two-cycle, Double-sequence, Crossover Study to Investigate the Effects of a Low-fat Diet On the Pharmacokinetics of Healthy Chinese Adult Participants After Oral Administration of Pyrotinib Maleate Tablets

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the effect of low-fat diet on pharmacokinetics of healthy Chinese adult participants after oral administration of pyrotinib maleate tablets.
The secondary objective of the study is to evaluate the safety of single dose of pyrotinib orally in healthy participants.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 28 days
through study completion, an average of 28 days
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of pyrotinib

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 28 days
secondary_outcome.description: Time of maximum observed concentration (Tmax) of pyrotinib

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 28 days
through study completion, an average of 28 days
secondary_outcome.description: Total body clearance for extravascular administration (CL/F) of pyrotinib

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 28 days

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion, an average of 28 days
secondary_outcome.description: An adverse event is any untoward medical occurrence in a patient or clinical study participant

intervention.intervention_name: pyrotinib maleate fasted in P1, low-fat diet in P2
intervention.description: pyrotinib maleate administration in fasted condition in period 1, pyrotinib maleate administration after low-fat diet in period 2

intervention.intervention_name: pyrotinib maleate low-fat diet in P1, fasted in P2
intervention.description: pyrotinib maleate administration after low-fat diet in period 1, pyrotinib maleate administration in fasted condition in period 2
